pos review: Simple but nice, clean rooms and veda. Personal was friendly and attentive. Very good location.

neg review: The bed was so old and uncomfortable. on friday night there was a "rock concert" in the reception area (It is a bar at the same time) while I was trying to sleep.. you need to pay for breakfast..

pos review: The atmosphere in the bar and the beers were awesome! The barman suggested excellent beer to order!
neg review: The beds were too loud.. but comfy!

pos review: Close to the center, clean sheets.
neg review: Toilets and sinks are too small and all the sockets are in the same place so it is not very comfortable to charge your phone.

pos review: Near the center but not worth. They are so many hotels around. Money for nothing!
neg review: There were all disgusting! For five rooms were two toilets, one of them out of order. Poor breakfast, tiny and not cleaning room, no good wifi, rude staff.

pos review: We loved the location and also the bar located in the first floor. It was the first time sharing a room with more people, but at the end it was not a problem for us. The price-quality ratio is good.
Great location. Room simple but clean.
neg review: Only 3 or 4 power plugs in a room for 6 people and the power plugs are in one corner.
